originalText.text: Panchita, Gabriel and the rest of their team were a pleasure to work with, and the end result was top notch.  They completely transformed our new apartment, and we could not recommend them more highly!

text.text: Panchita, Gabriel and the rest of their team were a pleasure to work with, and the end result was top notch.  They completely transformed our new apartment, and we could not recommend them more highly!

originalText.text:
I picked Precision Painting Plus because of their overwhelmingly positive reviews. No other painters even come close in review count and positive review count at that. From meeting Ross my project manager, who can communicate fluently in English which is important to me,  to completion of the project, everything went well. The final product came out better than expected and I get compliments from all the neighbors, ironically neighbors who never said boo to me before suddenly show interest in my house because of a simple yet apparently dramatic color change. Job was relatively straight forward. Color change old faded red colored steel siding to a more contemporary color on a two story semi-detached house (3 sides).
Whole job took four and half days. The first half day was power washing entire house and the other four were painting siding and window trim and a few window gates. Total job came in less than I had anticipated and had I known what a difference a color change would be I would have done it a decade ago.
Don't hesitate call Precision Painting Plus.

originalText.text: Amazing service from start to finish! We worked with Andres & Juliana to coordinate the project and the whole process was incredibly seamless. Not only was the estimate affordable compared to other companies, but the team overall was extremely efficient in completing the work. We had an interior room painted in our apartment and they were finished in 4 hours with no touchups needed. Will definitely be using them in the future!

originalText.text: I worked with Sean, Laurie and Eugene. Joel, Roberto and Ariel painted my apartment. I had the best experience with Precision. The guys who came to paint were professional and did an amazing job. The building is old so nothing is even and the paint job looks great! I highly recommend Precision and would definitely use them again if needed.

originalText.text: My experience with Precision Painting was stress free from beginning to end.  The job was actually finished in less days and I  was very happy with their work.  Highly recommend!
